text: Greatest Hits is a greatest hits album and fourth album by NB Ridaz. It was released on July 15, 2008. ==Track listing== # "So Fly" (produced by Big Fenix & Dj 2Swift) # "Pretty Girl" # "Runaway" # "Lost in Love" # "4-Ever" # "Tu Eres" # "Notice Me" # "Until I Die" # "Radio Song" # "A Perfect Man" # "Wishin" ==References== Category:2008 greatest hits albums Category:NB Ridaz albums
title: Greatest Hits (NB Ridaz album)
